visibility.description: Limit results to repositories with the specified visibility.

affiliation.description:
Comma-separated list of values. Can include:  
 * `owner`: Repositories that are owned by the authenticated user.  
 * `collaborator`: Repositories that the user has been added to as a collaborator.  
 * `organization_member`: Repositories that the user has access to through being a member of an organization. This includes every repository on every team that the user is on.

type.description: Limit results to repositories of the specified type. Will cause a `422` error if used in the same request as **visibility** or **affiliation**.

sort.description: The property to sort the results by.

direction.description: The order to sort by. Default: `asc` when using `full_name`, otherwise `desc`.

per_page.description: The number of results per page (max 100). For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

page.description: The page number of the results to fetch. For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

since.description: Only show repositories updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

before.description: Only show repositories updated before the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.
